Segment.name: UDA
Segment.comment: To specify the condition under which insurance coverage is offered

Field.name: OfferBasisCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the basis on which the underwriter offers to provide coverage

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: QuantityQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of quantity

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

SyntaxNote.name: P0304
SyntaxNote.comment: If either UDA03 or UDA04 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C050304
SyntaxNote.comment: If UDA05 is present, then UDA03 and UDA04 are required.

SyntaxNote.name: C060304
SyntaxNote.comment: If UDA06 is present, then UDA03 and UDA04 are required.
